Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Tile
extends Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents a cell of a Board. The position (row, col) of a Tile on the board is immutable. A Tile should belong to one and only one Board, but does not know which Board. A Tile may have one Worker standing on itself (no more than one) and has a building, whose height is represented by a ETileLevel value. A dome may be built on the Tile. The presence of a dome prevents any further building on the Tile.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • buildOneLevel

      public void buildOneLevel()
      Builds one building level on this Tile. If the building level is already ETileLevel.LEVEL3 and there is no dome, a dome is built. No action is performed if a dome is already built on this Tile, no matter what the building level is

    • buildDome

      public void buildDome()
      Builds a dome on this Tile

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      t1 - The first Tile to compare
      t2 - The second Tile to compare
      Returns:
      The height difference between the buildings on the given tiles
